CustomField.description: Total Amount to be paid, based on the VAT policy, the Subscription Type Amount and the related Promo.
CustomField.formula:
IF ( (VAT_Country_Code__c = "BE"), (TECH_Total_Amount_Factor__c / TECH_VAT_Applied_Factor__c),
IF (TECH_isIntraCommunautaire__c = TRUE || VAT_Number__c <> "N/A", TECH_Total_Amount_Factor__c,
TECH_Total_Amount_Factor__c / TECH_VAT_Applied_Factor__c))
CustomField.label: Total Amount (VAT Incl)
